channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- ZXCLOUD iRAI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- ZXCLOUD iRAI

item.title: CVE-2023-41780|2024-09-06T17:48:21.970Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is an unsafe DLL loading vulnerability in ZTE ZXCLOUD iRAI. Due to the program failed to adequately validate the user's input, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.
